_header: Of the uprist of Christ as Nicodemus gan tell
_description: Couplet introducing ME prose Gospel of Nicodemus

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Of þe vprist of Crist As Nichodemus gan telleHere now make ich
                    ende god schilde vs all ffrom helle
CamMagPep2498.Note: As conclusion to The Gospel of Nichodemus.

James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Bibliotheca Pepysiana: A Descriptive Catalogue of the Library of Samuel
                Pepys. Pt. III: Medieval Manuscripts.
         London, 1923: 3.110.
Påhlsson,  Joel,
                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
         Lund: Ohlsson, 1911: v.
